item.title: Lego Boost (c) Tracker
item.description: Target audience: developers wanting to play with Lego Boost (c). Lgbsttracker Star LEGOÂ® Boost Tracker helps to store all differents sensors collected for your favorite robot ;-) Documentation

item.title: Kaggle Competitions

item.title: CNN Courses
item.description: Target audience: developers wanting to start learning Data Science. Source code available here . This project aims to build a dog breed classifier. Tags OpenCV Keras HyperOpt

item.title: NLP Courses
item.description: Target audience: developers wanting to start learning Data Science. Source code available here . This project aims to propose Stack Overflow tag for each user based on non-supervised methodology. Tags Lemmatizer, Stemmer, CountVectorizer, TFIDF, LDA and NMF Word2vec

item.title: Clustering Courses
item.description: Target audience: developers wanting to start learning Data Science. Source code available here . This project aims to segment customers based on their transactions. Tags KMeans, PCA, RandomForestClassifier Xgboost HyperOpt Flask

item.title: Classification Courses
item.description: Target audience: developers wanting to start learning Data Science. Source code available here . This project aims to build movie recommendation engine. Tags KMeans, NearestNeighbors Flask
